summary: This patch enables the armor added by the Immersive Armors compilation (excluding helms) to appear on the predator races from the Predators: The Lost Tribes mod.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Prerequisites[/u]
You will need [b]Skyrim[/b], Skyrim's latest [b]official update[/b], [b]Dawnguard[/b], [b]Dragonborn[/b], [b]Immersive Armors[/b] and [b]Predators[/b] - [b]Lost Tribes[/b] in order to run this patch! 

To be clearer the necessary load order should look like this: 
[b]
Skyrim.esm[/b] 
U[b]pdate.esm
Dawnguard.esm
Dragonborn.esm
[/b]Hothtrooper44_armorcompilation.esp
PredatorsLostTribesV1.esp
(then my patch somewhere below)

[u]Description[/u]
It is exactly what the title suggests. It enables the armor added by Hothtrooper44's Immersive Armors compilation (excluding head related pieces) to appear on the predator races from Roland113's Predators: The Lost Tribes mod.

I have tested the mod myself, and all the items I've modified are visible on Predators except for the Nord Mail Heavy Bracers, which I can't find seem to change in the creation kit. If I've missed out any more items, feel free to notify me and I will see about amending it.

[u]Credits

[/u][b]Hothtrooper44[/b] and [b]every contributor[/b] to the massive Immersive Armors compilation.
[b]Roland113[/b], creator of the incredible Predators - Lost Tribes.
[b]Dnxyken[/b], for creating the earlier Yautja Compatibility patches, whose work has inspired me.
[b]Bethesda[/b], who we have to thank for Skyrim and its DLC in the first place.
author: DrifterDQ
